channel.title: GoWi.Fi is the easiest way to access a WI-FI hot spot on GoWi.Fi
channel.description: Recent content in GoWi.Fi is the easiest way to access a WI-FI hot spot on GoWi.Fi

item.title: The doors are open
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: The doors are open! We have been working around the clock to have our e-shop working, get an instruction video ready and build a nicer front page. We hope we have managed to do that, you will be our judge, but don’t be to harsh. Static website generators and Snipcart We built our website with our favorite website builder Appernetic.io that use the static website generator Hugo. To make the e-shop we have used Snipcart.

item.title: New 3D printed frames
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: New frames for the gowifi signs are 3d printed. The latest one in yellow and white. Here is one in PLA wood plastic hanged on the wall.

item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: GoWi.Fi GoWI.FI is the easiest way to instantly get WI-FI settings configured in your user’s mobile devices. The user doesn’t have to enter any SSID and password which gives the following advantages: Your staff don’t have to hand out passwords to visitors which saves time, Users can’t enter the wrong password You can use very long passwords which are safer You don’t have to use WPS which shouldn’t be used anyway,
